name: Geometry Hell (Marc Gálvez, Brián Piancino, youis11)
name_original: Geometry Hell (Marc Gálvez, Brián Piancino, youis11)
description:
When you think everything is going well, your machine gun goes wild and starts shooting OUT OF CONTROL.

Survive this hell while dodging bouncing bullets around 5 different rooms.

CONTROLS:

Keyboard & Mouse:

  • "WASD" to move
  • "LShift" to jump
  • "Mouse" to aim 

Hope you enjoy :3

GAMEPLAY:
